thread.title: Neutral Pieces Add a Refined Elegance for Spring - WSJ.com

author: Photography Benjamin Vnuk
title: Neutral Pieces Add a Refined Elegance for Spring - WSJ.com
text: Neutral Pieces Add a Refined Elegance for Spring This season's breezy staples in beiges, tans and khakis Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff Scroll PLAIN LUCK Ralph Lauren Collection shirt, $2,290, select Ralph Lauren stores, Wolford turtleneck, $475, wolford​.com, Derek Lam pants, $1,090, dereklam ​.com, Laura Lombardi necklaces, $124 each, lauralombardijewelry​.com, and A.P.C. shoes, $530, usonline​.apc.fr. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff Boss jacket, $2,195, hugoboss​.com, Nomia shirt, $410, and pants, $425, nomia-nyc​.com, Artemas Quibble belt, $795, artemas-quibble​.com. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff Michael Kors Collection jacket, $1,995, and pants, $975, select Michael Kors stores, Rachel Comey shirt, price upon request, similar styles available at rachelcomey​.com, Artemas Quibble belt, $795, artemas-quibble​.com, Ariana Boussard-Reifel silver cuff (top), $625, and brass, $550, marteau.co, Marteau silver cuff (below), $175, marteau.co. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff Tod’s shirt, $3,445, tods​.com, Elizabeth and James tank, $95, neimanmarcus​.com, Acne Studios pants, $360, acnestudios​.com, and Laura Lombardi necklaces, $124 each, lauralombardijewelry​.com. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff DOWN TO EARTH Carolina Herrera shirt, $1,090, Carolina Herrera, 954 Madison Avenue, New York, Loewe skirt, price upon request, similar styles available at loewe​.com, Ariana Boussard-Reifel brass cuff, $550, marteau.co, Marteau Vintage silver cuff, $175, marteau.co, and Laura Lombardi earrings, $82, lauralombardijewelry​.com. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff Salvatore Ferragamo jacket, $1,390, Salvatore Ferragamo boutiques nationwide, The Row tank, $320, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York, Hyke skirt, $625, totokaelo​.com, Artemas Quibble belt, $1,210, artemas-quibble​.com, Laura Lombardi earrings, $82, lauralombardijewelry​.com. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff SOFT OPTION Jonathan Cohen coat, $2,495, amarees​.com, Céline shirt, $1,050, and pants, $1,350, Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York, The Row tank, $320, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York, Laura Lombardi necklaces, $124 each, lauralombardijewelry​.com, Ariana Boussard-Reifel brass cuff, $550, marteau.co, Marteau Vintage silver cuff, $175, marteau.co, A.P.C. shoes, $530, usonline.apc.fr. Anderson pants, price upon request, j-w-anderson.com, The Row tank, $320, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York, Laura Lombardi necklaces, $124 each, lauralombardijewelry​.com, Ariana Boussard-Reifel brass cuff, $550, marteau.co, Marteau Vintage silver cuff, $175, marteau.co, A.P.C. shoes, $530, usonline.apc.fr. Model, Lameka Fox at IMG; hair, Tetsuya Yamakata; makeup, Courtney Perkins; set design, David de Quevedo. Photography by Benjamin Vnuk; Fashion Editor Laura Stoloff Advertisement
